Day 02 : Jan 27, 2015

Today we covered

Third party services

  • Sign up for Github Account
  • Use your GH account to sign up for CodePen
  • The use of ‘fork’, ‘save’, and working ‘open source’

HTML & CSS basics, continued

  • The W3c and why standards exist
  • meta tags
  • Display Elements: Block versus Inline elements
  • Making a list of links(codepen) using ul, li, and a
  • Benefits of using CanIUse.com
  • Commonly used units in CSS
  • Why we use reset.css and Normalize
  • CSS almanac, by Chris Coyier
  • Good practices: Classes and ids.
  • Box model
  • divs, header, footer, article, aside, nav, section

Homework

Everyday a bit of written, audio, or video resources will be assigned to review, which will supplement class assignments. Assignments are always due by 8:59am of the following day, unless noted.

Supplemental Resources

Along with the links above, check out Using CodePen, by Chris Coyier (video)

Assignments

  • Create a CodePen to show in class tomorrow that experiments with the box model after reading Box model. Save the pen to your own account.
  • Build your own site, lesson 2 and 3

Extra Resources

  • Breaking Stuff, by Laura Kalbag
  • Nine pillars of successful web teams, by Jesse James Garrett
  • Learn Layout
